infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Experiences needs camera access to capture and share moments with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Experiences needs photo library access to share photos with friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Experiences shows your location on posts so friends know where you are.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Experiences shows your location on posts so friends know where you are.

plugins.cameraPermission: Experiences needs camera access to take photos and videos to share with friends.
plugins.microphonePermission: Experiences needs microphone access to record videos with audio.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Experiences uses your location to show where your posts are from.

plugins.photosPermission: Experiences needs access to your photos to let you share them.
plugins.cameraPermission: Experiences needs camera access to take photos.
